issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Prospect is reporting severe performance issues developing on his environment.

Could you please confirm is such issue is expected with 8GB RAM. 
HAXM support no longer to be available in Windows 10. Can you please confirm this? 

Any expected/normal behaviour, when compared to running the app on a Mac computer with same specs (8GB RAM)? 

Any suggestions? Is it possible to better undertand the stem of the issue by getting the log files from prospect/client?

comments.body: Hello, We need specific issue description and reproducible code for us to test. Please be specific about the issue and provide sufficient data for us to test in Windows platform. Thanks.
